bibl.title: Magic and Ritual in the Ancient World. (Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 141.)
bibl.note: 24 essays presented at the second international conference on "Magic in the Ancient World", held in August 1998 at Chapman University in Orange, California, and the Institute for Antiquity and Christianity of Claremont Graduate University in Claremont, California.
MIRECKI Paul and Marvin MEYER (Edd.), Magic and Ritual in the Ancient World. (Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 141.)
